Key Match Events: Luka Modrić scored a free-kick goal in the 51st minute to secure a 1-0 victory for Croatia
Others: Croatia dominated the first half with 58% possession and 10 shots on goal to Poland’s one
Captain Luka Modrić made his 180th appearance for the national team against Poland
Coach Zlatko Dalić made five changes from the starting line-up in Lisbon, giving the young Igor Matanović a chance from the first minute
